name: instant-data-lake
label: Instant Data Lake (Serverless)
short_description: Deploy a free, zero-config data lake in 90 seconds. Instantly run SQL on files you upload to Cloud Object Storage.
long_description: This deployable architecture creates a simple, free, serverless data lake. It provisions two free 'Lite' tier services: 1. Cloud Object Storage (COS): A bucket to store your files (CSV, JSON, Parquet). 2. SQL Query: A serverless service to run SQL on those files. The SQL Query service is automatically pre-configured to use your new COS bucket, so you can start querying seconds after uploading.

architecture.description: Deploys one 'lite' Cloud Object Storage instance and one 'lite' SQL Query instance, with the SQL Query instance pre-configured to use the COS bucket as its default target.

features.title: Deploy in 90 Seconds
features.description: Get a fully functional, serverless data lake running in under 2 minutes.

features.title: Zero-Input Deployment
features.description: No configuration needed. Click 'Deploy' and all resources are created with unique names.

features.title: Completely Free
features.description: Uses the 'Lite' plans for both services, so you can deploy and use it for free.

features.title: Instant SQL Queries
features.description: Drag-and-drop your CSV/JSON files and immediately run SQL on them. No servers or database setup required.
